# Metadata Format Description Constants

**API Collection**

Constants that identify metadata format descriptions.

## Constants

- **kCMMetadataBaseDataType_AffineTransformF64**: A type that identifies a 3x3 matrix of 64-bit big endian floating point numbers in a row-major order that specify an affine transform.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescriptionKey_ConformingDataTypes**: A key that identifies the conforming data types.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescriptionKey_DataType**: A key that identifies the data type.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescriptionKey_DataTypeNamespace**: A key that identifies the data type namespace.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescriptionKey_LanguageTag**: A key that identifies the language tag.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescriptionKey_LocalID**: A key that identifies the local identifier.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescriptionKey_Namespace**: A key that identifies the namespace.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescriptionKey_SetupData**: A key that identifies setup data.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescriptionKey_StructuralDependency**: A key that identifies the structural dependency.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescriptionKey_Value**: A key that identifies the value.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescriptionMetadataSpecificationKey_DataType**: A specification key that identifies the data type.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescriptionMetadataSpecificationKey_ExtendedLanguageTag**: A specification key that identifies the extended language tag.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescriptionMetadataSpecificationKey_Identifier**: A specification key that identifies the identifier.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescriptionMetadataSpecificationKey_SetupData**: A specification key that identifies the setup data.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescriptionMetadataSpecificationKey_StructuralDependency**: A specification key that identifies dependencies.
- **kCMMetadataFormatDescription_StructuralDependencyKey_DependencyIsInvalidFlag**: A specification key that identifies the depencency isn’t valid.

## Constants

- **Audio Format Description Mask Codes**: Mask codes that identify audio formats.
- **Chroma Location Extension Constants**: Constants that identify chroma location extensions.
- **Clean Aperture Extension Constants**: Constants that identify clean aperture extensions.
- **Closed Caption Format Type Constants**: Types that identify closed caption formats.
- **Color Primary Extension Constants**: Constants that identify color primary extensions.
- **Field Detail Extension Constants**: Constants that identify field detail extensions.
- **Format Description Bridge Error Codes**: Bridge errors the system returns from format description calls.
- **Format Description Constants**: Constants that identify format descriptions.
- **Format Description Error Codes**: Errors the system returns from format description calls.
- **HEVC Temporal Level Info Constants**: Constants that identify HEVC temporal level information.
- **MPEG-2-conformant Formats**: Constants that identify MPEG-2 formats.
- **Pixel Aspect Ratio Extension Constants**: Constants that identify pixel aspect ratio extensions.
- **Text Display Flags**: Flags that identify text display methods.
- **Text Format Constants**: Types that identify text formats.
- **Text Format Description Constants**: Constants that identify text format descriptions.
